issue.title: [R] Implement .names argument inside across()
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17364](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17364). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-11699 adds support for `dplyr::across` inside a `mutate()`.  The `.names` argument is not  yet supported but should be added.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17364?focusedCommentId=17598872) by Nicola Crane (thisisnic):*
This has now been implemented as part of ARROW-11699
